properties.Description: The properties of the image template

identity.Description: The identity of the image template, if configured.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

source.Description: Specifies the properties used to describe the source image.

customize.Description: Specifies the properties used to describe the customization steps of the image, like Image source etc

distribute.Description: The distribution targets where the image output needs to go to.

lastRunStatus.Description: State of 'run' that is currently executing or was last executed.

buildTimeoutInMinutes.Description: Maximum duration to wait while building the image template. Omit or specify 0 to use the default (4 hours).

vmProfile.Description: Describes how virtual machine is set up to build images

imageId.Description: ARM resource id of the managed image in customer subscription

type.Description: Specifies the type of source image you want to start with.

version.Description: Image version from the [Azure Gallery Images](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/compute/virtualmachineimages). If 'latest' is specified here, the version is evaluated when the image build takes place, not when the template is submitted.

exactVersion.Description: Image version from the [Azure Gallery Images](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/compute/virtualmachineimages). This readonly field differs from 'version', only if the value specified in 'version' field is 'latest'.

planInfo.Description: Optional configuration of purchase plan for platform image.

type.Description: Specifies the type of source image you want to start with.

imageVersionId.Description: ARM resource id of the image version in the shared image gallery

type.Description: Specifies the type of source image you want to start with.

name.Description: Friendly Name to provide context on what this customization step does

sourceUri.Description: The URI of the file to be uploaded for customizing the VM. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc

sha256Checksum.Description: SHA256 checksum of the file provided in the sourceUri field above

destination.Description: The absolute path to a file (with nested directory structures already created) where the file (from sourceUri) will be uploaded to in the VM

type.Description: The type of customization tool you want to use on the Image. For example, "Shell" can be shell customizer

scriptUri.Description: URI of the PowerShell script to be run for customizing. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc

sha256Checksum.Description: SHA256 checksum of the power shell script provided in the scriptUri field above

inline.Description: Array of PowerShell commands to execute

runElevated.Description: If specified, the PowerShell script will be run with elevated privileges

runAsSystem.Description: If specified, the PowerShell script will be run with elevated privileges using the Local System user. Can only be true when the runElevated field above is set to true.

validExitCodes.Description: Valid exit codes for the PowerShell script. [Default: 0]

type.Description: The type of customization tool you want to use on the Image. For example, "Shell" can be shell customizer

scriptUri.Description: URI of the shell script to be run for customizing. It can be a github link, SAS URI for Azure Storage, etc

sha256Checksum.Description: SHA256 checksum of the shell script provided in the scriptUri field

inline.Description: Array of shell commands to execute

type.Description: The type of customization tool you want to use on the Image. For example, "Shell" can be shell customizer

restartCommand.Description: Command to execute the restart [Default: 'shutdown /r /f /t 0 /c "packer restart"']

restartCheckCommand.Description: Command to check if restart succeeded [Default: '']

restartTimeout.Description: Restart timeout specified as a string of magnitude and unit, e.g. '5m' (5 minutes) or '2h' (2 hours) [Default: '5m']

type.Description: The type of customization tool you want to use on the Image. For example, "Shell" can be shell customizer

searchCriteria.Description: Criteria to search updates. Omit or specify empty string to use the default (search all). Refer to above link for examples and detailed description of this field.

filters.Description: Array of filters to select updates to apply. Omit or specify empty array to use the default (no filter). Refer to above link for examples and detailed description of this field.

updateLimit.Description: Maximum number of updates to apply at a time. Omit or specify 0 to use the default (1000)

type.Description: The type of customization tool you want to use on the Image. For example, "Shell" can be shell customizer

runOutputName.Description: The name to be used for the associated RunOutput.

artifactTags.Description: Tags that will be applied to the artifact once it has been created/updated by the distributor.

imageId.Description: Resource Id of the Managed Disk Image

location.Description: Azure location for the image, should match if image already exists

galleryImageId.Description: Resource Id of the Shared Image Gallery image

replicationRegions.Description: A list of regions that the image will be replicated to

excludeFromLatest.Description: Flag that indicates whether created image version should be excluded from latest. Omit to use the default (false).

storageAccountType.Description: Storage account type to be used to store the shared image. Omit to use the default (Standard_LRS).

provisioningErrorCode.Description: Error code of the provisioning failure

message.Description: Verbose error message about the provisioning failure

startTime.Description: Start time of the last run (UTC)

endTime.Description: End time of the last run (UTC)

message.Description: Verbose information about the last run state

vmSize.Description: Size of the virtual machine used to build, customize and capture images. Omit or specify empty string to use the default (Standard_D2ds_v4).

osDiskSizeGB.Description: Size of the OS disk in GB. Omit or specify 0 to use Azure's default OS disk size.

userAssignedIdentities.Description: Optional array of resource IDs of user assigned managed identities to be configured on the build VM. This may include the identity of the image template.

vnetConfig.Description: Optional configuration of the virtual network to use to deploy the build virtual machine in. Omit if no specific virtual network needs to be used.

subnetId.Description: Resource id of a pre-existing subnet.

proxyVmSize.Description: Size of the virtual machine used to build, customize and capture images. Omit or specify empty string to use the default (Standard_D1_v2 for Gen1 images and Standard_D2ds_v4 for Gen2 images).

type.Description: The type of identity used for the image template. The type 'None' will remove any identities from the image template.

userAssignedIdentities.Description: The list of user identities associated with the image template. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}'.

principalId.Description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

clientId.Description: The client id of user assigned identity.

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)
